name: Stripe Fee Collection API
description: A nodejs API used to collect stripe fees

API_SECRET.description: A secret key used to access the report route! If not defined the route will be open.

EMAIL_RECIPIENT.description: The email address for the recipient of the reports emails

NODE_ENV.description: Used for NPM and others to determine what kind of environment to initialize

SENDGRID_USER.description: The username of the sendgrid user, the service used to send the report emails

SENDGRID_PASS.description: The password used for the sendgrid email service

STRIPE_KEY.description: Your Stripe API key used to gather the information about the charges!
